main
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  main.Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

A simulated player that can either decide the Direction to walk into or walk around at random

See Also:
Garden

          The player's appleCache is emptied into the other garden.

          The player walks in the previously set direction; he stops once he either reaches the garden's boundaries or an apple.

appleCache

public int appleCache
The number of apples the Player currently carries on him. Apples are thrown into the other garden after each move

See Also:
walkRandom(), walk()

The player's current Position

Constructor Detail

Player

public Player(Garden ownGarden,
              Garden enemyGarden)
Parameters:
ownGarden - The garden the player walks and collects apples on
enemyGarden - The other player's garden that the Player will throw the collected apples on
See Also:
Garden
Method Detail

walkRandom

public void walkRandom()
The player walks to a randomly generated field of the eight fields surrounding him.

walk

public void walk()
The player walks in the previously set direction; he stops once he either reaches the garden's boundaries or an apple.

See Also:
setDirection(int)

setDirection

public void setDirection(int dice)
The direction that the player will walk into is set.

If apples can be reached in multiple directions, the decision between them happens at random. The same applies if no apples at all can be reached.

Parameters:
dice - The distance the player can cover in this move.

throwApples

public void throwApples()
The player's appleCache is emptied into the other garden.

See Also:
Garden.spreadApples(int)
